languages.text: {n}Конечно, это приводило к кровопролитию, и многие планетарные губернаторы ополчились против династии фон Валанциус, столь грубо отобравшей у них ценных слуг.{/n}

{n}Naturally, this has led to much bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, after having their valuable servants so unceremoniously taken away from them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Конечно, это приводило к кровопролитию, и многие планетарные губернаторы ополчились против династии фон Валанциус, столь грубо отобравшей у них ценных слуг.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Naturally, this had caused bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, who had so unceremoniously taken their valuable servants away from them.{/n}
{n}Naturally, this had caused bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, who had so unceremoniously taken their valuable servants away from them.{/n}

{n}Naturally, this has led to much bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, after having their valuable servants so unceremoniously taken away from them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}自然，这样的决定酿成了无数流血事件。许多行星的统治者转而反对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，因为审判庭毫不客气地征收了他们重要的仆人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Naturally, this has led to much bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, after having their valuable servants so unceremoniously taken away from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}自然，这样的决定酿成了无数流血事件。许多行星的统治者转而反对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，因为审判庭毫不客气地征收了他们重要的仆人。{/n}
{n}自然，这样的决定造成了无数流血事件。许多行星的统治者转而反对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，因为审判庭毫不客气地夺走了他们宝贵的仆人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Naturalmente, esto ha causado un gran derramamiento de sangre, y muchos gobernadores planetarios se han vuelto contra la dinastía von Valancius por haberles arrebatado tan poco ceremoniosamente a sus valiosos sirvientes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Naturally, this has led to much bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, after having their valuable servants so unceremoniously taken away from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Naturalmente, esto ha causado un gran derramamiento de sangre, y muchos gobernadores planetarios se han vuelto contra la dinastía von Valancius por haberles arrebatado tan poco ceremoniosamente a sus valiosos sirvientes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当然のことながら、この事態により多くの者が血を流すことになり、多くの惑星の統治者たちは、自分たちの貴重な従者をあっさりと奪い去ったフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に反旗を翻した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Naturally, this has led to much bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, after having their valuable servants so unceremoniously taken away from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当然のことながら、この事態により多くの者が血を流すことになり、多くの惑星の統治者たちは、自分たちの貴重な従者をあっさりと奪い去ったフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に反旗を翻した。{/n}
{n}当然のことながら、この事態により多くの者が血を流すことになり、多くの惑星の統治者たちは、自分たちの貴重な従者をあっさりと奪い去ったフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に反旗を翻した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Naturellement, cela provoque un véritable bain de sang, et nombre de gouverneurs planétaires se retournent contre cette maudite dynastie von Valancius qui leur enlève sans vergogne leurs plus précieux serviteurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Naturally, this has led to much bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, after having their valuable servants so unceremoniously taken away from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Naturellement, cela provoque un véritable bain de sang, et nombre de gouverneurs planétaires se retournent contre cette maudite dynastie von Valancius qui leur enlève sans vergogne leurs plus précieux serviteurs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Natürlich führte das zu reichlich Blutvergießen und viele planetare Gouverneure haben sich gegen die Dynastie derer von Valancius gewandt, nachdem ihnen kurzerhand ihre wertvollen Diener genommen wurden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Naturally, this has led to much bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, after having their valuable servants so unceremoniously taken away from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Natürlich führte das zu reichlich Blutvergießen und viele planetare Gouverneure haben sich gegen die Dynastie derer von Valancius gewandt, nachdem ihnen kurzerhand ihre wertvollen Diener genommen wurden.{/n}

{n}Natürlich hat das zu reichlich Blutvergießen geführt, und viele planetare Gouverneure haben sich gegen die Dynastie derer von Valancius gewandt, nachdem ihnen ihre wertvollen Diener einfach kurzerhand abgenommen worden waren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Doğal olarak bu hadise, nicelerinin kanının dökülmesine yol açtı. Kıymetli hizmetkârları kabaca ellerinden alınan gezegen valilerinin pek çoğu, von Valancius hanedanlığına hasım oldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Naturally, this has led to much bloodshed, and many planetary governors have turned against the von Valancius dynasty, after having their valuable servants so unceremoniously taken away from them.{/n}
